analyzed: aa lu ka zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Achievement called Ālukā

original: aom aa lu ke be lu ke grihna pi na dam pi sh'a tsa ni sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom aa lu ke be lu ke grihna pi na dam pi sh'a tsa ni sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ ālukā velukā gṛhṇa pindaṃ piśācanisvāhā

original: bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig bzlas la /
analyzed: bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig bzlas la /
translated: Recite the familiarization once a hundred thousand times.

original: de nas sgrub pa brtsam par byas te rang zan za ba'i phud la sngags lan bdun bzlas te rgyab tu bor na /
analyzed: de nas sgrub pa brtsam par byas te rang zan za ba'i phud la sngags lan bdun bzlas te rgyab tu bor na /
translated: Then, begin the achievement. Having recited the mantra seven times over the first portion of one's own food, cast it behind one.

original: zhag bdun nas rang gi rna bar gtam gshod  du 'ong ngo //
analyzed: zhag bdun nas rang gi rna bar gtam gshod  du 'ong ngo //
translated: After seven days, a conversation will come to one's ear.

original: gal te sgrub pa dang po la ma byung na yi chad par mi bya ste /
analyzed: gal te sgrub pa dang po la ma byung na yi chad par mi bya ste /
translated: If it does not occur in the first achievement, do not despair.

original: sgrub pa gnyis la bram ze bsad kyang grub par 'gyur ba la the tshom med do //
analyzed: sgrub pa gnyis la bram ze bsad kyang grub par 'gyur ba la the tshom med do //
translated: If one does the second achievement, even if one kills a brahmin, there is no doubt that one will be successful.

original: de ma yin na dpal rdo rje 'chang gi bka' bcag pas mgo gas sam 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ma yin na dpal rdo rje 'chang gi bka' bcag pas mgo gas sam 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, one will break the command of glorious Vajradhara, and one's head will split open or one will die.

original: aa lu ka zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: aa lu ka zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: The Means of Achievement called Ālukā is complete.
